casebody.head_matter:
Arras v. Stawski, Appellant.
Argued March 18, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Herbert N. Rosenberg, with him Rosenberg & Kirshner, for appellant.
Seymour A. Sikov, with him Sikov and Love, for appellee.
David B. Fawcett, Jr., with him Daniel P. Stefko, and Dickie, McCamey & Ghilcote, for appellee.
July 2, 1970:
